methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the variables in the current session.

params.name: assigned
params.description: An array of variables that have been newly assigned.

params.name: removed
params.description: An array of variable names that have been removed.

params.name: version
params.description: The version of the view (incremented with each update), or 0 if the backend doesn't track versions.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Replace all variables in the current session with the variables from the backend.

params.name: variables
params.description: An array listing all the variables in the current session.

params.name: length
params.description: The number of variables in the current session.

params.name: version
params.description: The version of the view (incremented with each update), or 0 if the backend doesn't track versions.
